mapper.update: update recipe set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, photo=#{photo}, regdate = sysdate where no = #{no}
update recipe set viewCnt = viewCnt+1 where no=#{no}
update recipe set replyCnt = replyCnt+1 where no=#{no}
update recipe set likes = (select count(*) from recipeLikes where no=#{no}) where no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from recipeLikes where no=#{no} and userNo=#{userNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from recipeLikes where no=#{no} and userNo=#{userNo}
select no from recipeLikes where userNo = #{userNo}

select no,title,content,writer,(select nickName from member where no=writer) nickName, regdate,replyCnt,viewCnt,photo , likes, ingredient,price,time,difficulty,per,foodName from recipe natural join precipe where no=#{no}

select no,photo, time, per, price, likes,foodName from recipe natural join precipe
order by no desc
where regdate >= sysdate-7 order by likes desc
where no in((select no from recipeLikes where userNo=#{userNo}) ) order by no desc
